column5: Did anyone else  when you noticed that by clicking on the cougar sighting post by Dr. Sal., that google ads started advertising Cougarlife on OFC?  Advertising/marketing is a crazy thing, especially mixed with technology. From the Malware that advertises Netflix, to the high volume commercials on TV, to the websites that know exactly what you search and where you are, I can only imagine what they'll come up with next.  Luckily the words fish-porn don't have the same effect.
